name: belletrist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who writes belles-lettres (= works of literature that are beautiful and good in an artistic way, rather than being very serious or full of information): The Southern writer was known as a belletrist who could write lyrically even about banal subjects like doing laundry and going to the airport. He worked at the magazine that published a number of the country's most talented and witty belle-lettrists.
